title: Derivative Cash Flow Schema
description: A derivative cash flow where two parties exchange cash flows (or assets) derived from an underlying reference index, security or financial instrument.

id.description: The unique identifier for the derivative within the financial institution.

date.description: The observation or effective date for the data in this object. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

asset_class.description: The asset class to which the derivative belongs.

asset_liability.description: A derivative cash flow exchange that results in a net positive value after the transaction is an asset on the firm's balance sheet. A derivative cash flow exchange that results in a net negative value after the transaction is a liability on the firm's balance sheet.

balance.description: The contractual balance due on the payment date in the currency given. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

currency_code.description: Actual currency of the security in accordance with ISO 4217 standards. It should be consistent with balance, accrued_interest, guarantee_amount and other monetary amounts.

derivative_id.description: Unique identifier to the derivative to which this cash flow relates

leg.description: The type of the payment leg.

mna_id.description: The unique identifier of the Master Netting Agreement for this derivative cash flow.

notional_amount.description: The notional value is the total value with regard to a derivative's underlying index, security or asset at its spot price in accordance with the specifications (i.e. leverage) of the derivative product. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

on_balance_sheet.description: Is the financial product reported on the balance sheet of the financial institution?

product_name.description: The name of the product as given by the financial institution to be used for display and reference purposes.

reporting_lei.description: The LEI code for the legal entity under which the security is being reported.

reporting_entity_name.description: The name of the reporting legal entity for display purposes (as LEI code may not be available).

settlement_type.description: The type of settlement for the contract.

sources.description: Identifiers for data sources. Useful for analytics and MI purposes.

type.description: This is the type of the derivative cash flow with regards to common regulatory classifications.

trade_date.description: The timestamp that the trade or financial product terms are agreed. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

value_date.description: The timestamp that the cash flow was valued/occurred. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.
